calculateLeaderApr(address).details: APR = (Total Fees Earned / Average Capital) * (365 days / Time Period) * 100

getTokenPriceUsd(address).details: Validates round completion, price validity, and timestamp freshness

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

calculateLeaderApr(address).notice: Calculate APR for a leader based on historical data

calculateMaxDrawdown(address).notice: Calculate maximum drawdown for a leader

calculateRiskScore(address).notice: Calculate risk score based on volatility

calculateUsdValue(address,uint256).notice: Calculate USD value of a token amount

calculateVaultApr(address).notice: Calculate APR for a specific vault

compareVsHodl(address,address).notice: Compare vault APR vs simple HODL

getTokenPriceUsd(address).notice: Get USD price for a token using Chainlink with staleness and validation checks

recordSnapshot(address,uint256,uint256,b.notice: Record a snapshot for performance tracking

setPriceFeed(address,address).notice: Set Chainlink price feed for a token

updateLeaderMetrics(address).notice: Update all metrics for a leader
